name: the-last-question
description: This webpage is a reformatted version of this page - [http://users.ece.cmu.edu/~gamvrosi/thelastq.html](http://users.ece.cmu.edu/~gamvrosi/thelastq.html) (text from The Last Question by Isaac Asimov)- to make it easier on the eyes for reading and provide a dark mode option.
